ppl_assignment

Class input

  • java.lang.Object
    • ppl_assignment.input

  • public class input
extends java.lang.Object

    Input class

    Takes input corresponding to girls,boys,gifts.Further assigns partners,finds happiness of couples,compatibility of couples,sorts them.
